Hey <!everyone> , heroku's all set up with a public account now so anyone can pull the code for the site. Here's how to pull the new repository:

log into heroku with "heroku login"
put in the following info

username: <mailto:founditbot@gmail.com|founditbot@gmail.com>
pass: keysplease16

then use "heroku git:clone ufoundit"
and you should be good to go!

url for the site rn is "<http://ufoundit.herokuapp.com/foundit|ufoundit.herokuapp.com/foundit>" (the /foundit is temporary)
